title: Finishing Strong
content: Graduation Finishing Strong Did you read, watch, and listen to everything you wanted to listen to? Complete all the fieldwork you meant to complete?

title: No Rush
content:
If there are unchecked checkboxes lingering in your SJMD To-Do list, worry not:
Everything will be here after you go. And you don’t lose access to any of the course materials when you graduate.
So there’s no rush! You can “Graduate”, see what doors open to you on that front, and always pop back to that Module or Topic you didn’t spend quite as much time on as you wanted.

title: Open Door Policy
Full Community Access
content:
As a graduate of the SJMD Course, you’ll have access to the rest of the SJMD Community (beyond just the course category).
Once you’re cleared, we have several new categories waiting for you (like “In the News” and ”(Un)Learning”), and as many new threads as you can create: Oh yeah, you’ll be able to create threads!
Other features will also open up to you as a graduate and trusted community member. We’ll leave you to figure those out.

title: Making it Official
content: Graduation Making it Official You’re done when you say you’re done.

title: Save Everything
content:
The emails we sent you with the links to the Modules will be useful in the future if you ever want to revisit them. You can also just copy the following list to a text editor to save:
 Module 1: https://dotcommunity.course.sjmd.space Module 2: https://barkslikeadogma.course.sjmd.space Module 3: https://cornerstones.course.sjmd.space Module 4: https://acolytes.course.sjmd.space Module 5: https://thesespieces.course.sjmd.space Module 6: https://irl.course.sjmd.space  Note: The Modules are all living projects, so there’s a chance that when you revisit one it will have changed (different readings, tweaked topics, etc.).
If you want to really save everything, you can download each Module in its entirety (SJMD is totally open source), and open it as a website directly from your computer. Here are the links: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 (open the .ZIP, open the “public” folder, then double click index.html to view the Module)

title: Opening Doors
content:
Graduation Opening Doors “When one door closes, another five to seven doors open. And that first door doesn’t even have to close for that to be true!”
— SJMD

title: We're Done When...
content:
If you’re not sure whether or not you’re “done” with the course, here’s our take:
We’re done when we’ve enacted Living Social Justice, having dismantled dogma and oppression along the way.
Until then, it’s okay to feel like you’re not done – with this course, with your MVP Project idea, with your learning and unlearning in general! All of this, and all of us, are works in progress.
But for now, without feeling the slightest bit of irony, please go ahead and click that “Done” button. We’ve got some fun things waiting for ya ðŸ‘‡

title: Graduation
content: SJMD Course Graduation Congrats! Let’s move that tassle, shall we?
